Uses of Class
chessapi4j.Bitboard

  • Packages that use Bitboard 
    Package Description
    chessapi4j
    This package contains the object orientated classes of chessapi4j.
    chessapi4j.functional
    This package contains classes that are especially well-suited for functional programming and for applications that operate in multithreaded environments.

    • Uses of Bitboard in chessapi4j

      Methods in chessapi4j that return Bitboard 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Bitboard Bitboard.and​(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "and bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
      Bitboard Move.bitboardMove()
      Wrapped bitboard representing the move.
      Bitboard Position.getBitboard​(Piece piece)
      Retrieves the Bitboard object that represent the positions of the given Piece.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.not​(Bitboard bitboard)
      Negates the given bitboard.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.or​(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "or bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
      Bitboard Bitboard.popFirstBit()
      Removes and returns the most significant bit set to 1 in the bitboard.
      Bitboard Bitboard.popLastBit()
      Removes and returns the least significant bit set to 1 in the bitboard.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.shiftLeft​(Bitboard x, int shift)
      Performs a bitwise left shift on the given bitboard.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.shiftRight​(Bitboard x, int shift)
      Performs a bitwise right shift (>>>) on the given bitboard.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.xor​(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "xor bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
      Methods in chessapi4j with parameters of type Bitboard 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Bitboard Bitboard.and​(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "and bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.

      Negates the given bitboard.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.or​(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "or bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
      void Position.setBitboard​(Piece piece, Bitboard bitboard)
      Sets the Bitboard object that represent the positions of the given Piece.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.shiftLeft​(Bitboard x, int shift)
      Performs a bitwise left shift on the given bitboard.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.shiftRight​(Bitboard x, int shift)
      Performs a bitwise right shift (>>>) on the given bitboard.
      static Bitboard Bitboard.xor​(Bitboard... bitboards)
      Apply the "xor bit to bit" operation over the values of the bitboards and retrieves a new Bitboard object that wraps the result of this operation.
